description: ff. 321. 275 x 188; 210 x 130 mm. 31 lin. collated with the autograph in Jumādá II, 915. Abridgment of his al-Ghurar al-bahīyah completed in 895 H.: Brockelmann, GAL, S I, 679 (commentary c, Ausz.). Incip.: ... قال ... الحمد لله الذى اظهر لدىنه زىنا وبهجة
author: Anṣārī, Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad, ca. 1423-ca. 1520
title: Khulāṣat al-fawāʻid al-mahwīyah fī sharḥ al-Bahjah al-Wardīyah
creator: Anṣārī, Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad, ca. 1423-ca. 1520
subject: Ibn al-Wardī, Zayn al-Dīn ʻUmar ibn al-Muẓaffar, -1349—Bahjat al-Ḥāwī.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
